overview: There may be work that has to be done, but if you employ good-looking, hot twinks, then it's a guarantee that your job is going to run over schedule because these boys have better things to do than get all hot and sweaty building a wall or painting - they'd rather get hot and sweaty with each other! Downing tools and discarding hard hats, these horny workers can't resist the lure of a throbbing cock and it looks like lunch time has come early as they devour some hot meat whilst asses are fingered, tongue fucked and prepped for some hard, barebacking action. Looks like the boss is going to have to pay for some overtime!
title: Twinks at Work
